HIDDeviceSendFeatureReport.summary: The sendFeatureReport() method of the interface sends a feature report to the HID device. Feature reports are a way for HID devices and applications to exchange non-standardized HID data.

remarks.para: The reportId for each of the report formats that this device supports can be retrieved from .

HIDDeviceSendFeatureReport.returns: A that resolves with undefined once the report has been sent.
